name: The Seer/Spoilers
description: The Seer's past is as obscure as his own character. His appearance is deformed, and it is unclear if this is congenital, a result of disease, or even the result of violence. His eyes were either sewn shut or skin grew over his eyes. In either case his appearance is quite disturbing. Furthermore, despite his apparent blindness, it often seems like he can in fact see. He wears a dark cloak and prefers environments with very poor light.

name: Mariam
description: Mariam was born in Aleppo. She is very well educated. It's been her life's desire to explore many places. She studies the elements in the skies. Mariam traveled to Novgorod to look for pieces of meteorites. Due to the Pecheneg blockade of the Dnieper River, she's been stuck in Novgorod. She is very sick and wants to go to Constantinople to see the doctors there.

name: Kurya
description: When Kurya's brother became the new Khan, he stole Kurya's wife, blinded Kurya, and forced him to listen while he raped his wife all night. The next day while the Khan was sleeping, Kurya's wife freed him and helped him escape. As punishment, the Khan butchered her and now he supposedly drinks wine every night from a silver cup made from her skull. The Khan has put a large bounty on Kurya's head.

attributes.Deathway: Stabbed by Pechenegs and shot by Leif Eriksson

name: Egil
description: Later, Egil reappears when Harald and Halfdan give him instructions toattack Kattegat. After KingHaraldandHalfdanleave, Egil launches the attack onKattegat. He first uses a decoy in the center of the city to see how weak the defenses are. Soon after, Egil attacks Kattegat by using the boats and men he got from King Harald. ButLagerthafoils his plan. Whereas his men fled, Egil charges Lagertha only to be struck byAstrid's spear, she prepares to finish him but Lagertha has others plans for him....

attributes.Deathway: Mortally wounded by Astrid ; possibly executed

name: Þorunn
description: Þorunn is introduced during a dinner party held byRagnarwhere she accidentally spills beer on Björn, who tells her not to worry about it. Björn finds the girl again and asks for her name and that she sit with him, though Þorunn keeps telling him that she must finish her work. Björn asks where she sleeps and she replies, "In the barn with the other slaves and farm animals." He asks if she has a boyfriend, to which she playfully answers, "Of course." Ragnar notices his son awkwardly interacting...
